name: diancite
effect: Held: Allows Diancie to Mega Evolve into Mega Diancie.
short_effect: Held: Allows Diancie to Mega Evolve into Mega Diancie.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Diancie hold it, and this stone will enable it
to Mega Evolve during battle.
